title: Data Loading & Backup
content:

search
 
Autoloader
 – used to define scheduled upload of data from 
SmartFolders
 into company, contact, and 
applications
.
 
Disable Login Access...
 – checkbox disables access to the 
backup server
 for all non-
Global User Administrator
 accounts.
 
 Retrieved from ‘
